The Daughter of Evil: BGM Reading Collection

「(「)悪(あく)ノ(ノ)娘(むすめ)」(」)読(どく)書(しょ)の(の)ため(ため)の(の)BGM(BGM)集(しゅう)"aku NO musume" dokusho no tame no BGM shuu

ANI-AKUNO1402

A promotional album distributed with select copies of The Daughter of Evil: Act 1 featuring instrumentals by mothy and arrangements by Travolta-P. The album was first sent out on February 17, 2014, and is currently unavailable.

Playlist · Scans

Tracklist

  1. The Daughter and Servant of Evil
  2. The Daughter of Evil (arrange version)
  3. The Servant of Evil (arrange version)

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by Mizutame Tori.
